description: This file contains utility functions for downloading images, videos, files, saving base64 data, and downloading sample data files with configurable extensions. It also defines an enumeration for file extensions.

classes.name: SampleDataFileExtension
classes.description: An enumeration for different sample data file extensions such as DOCX, PDF, TXT, JSON, and CSV.

methods.name: download_image
methods.description: Downloads an image from a URL and saves it to a specified local path, verifying the content type.

methods.name: download_video
methods.description: Downloads a video from a URL and saves it to a specified local path.

methods.name: download_file
methods.description: Downloads a file from a URL and saves it to a specified local path, raising an exception on failure.

methods.name: save_base64_data
methods.description: Decodes a base64 string and saves it as bytes to a specified file path.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads a specified number of sample data files with a configurable extension, returning their paths.

search-terms: image download with content type check
